function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Strict adherence to infection control measures and protocols","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns, improve healthcare access in affected areas","category":"Healthcare access","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of alternative care facilities, telemedicine, and community health interventions","category":"Healthcare access","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Learning from the pandemic, organizational transformation, and behavior change initiatives","category":"Learning from pandemic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing low-cost and self-help medical solutions using off-the-shelf devices","category":"Medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use alternative testing methods, such as PCR testing, and rely on symptom monitoring and contact tracing.","category":"Testing methods","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focused training programs for at-risk occupations, career transition support, and investment in upskilling immigrant workers","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promote use of multiple vector control methods","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to reduce physical interaction, such as remote participation and virtual events. Increase sanitation and hygiene protocols in shared spaces.","category":"Reduce physical interaction","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrated approach to sustainable design and risk reduction","category":"Sustainable design","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote green infrastructure and sustainable cooling solutions","category":"Green infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict regulations and consent requirements for the collection and use of personal location data. Educate the public about the risks and provide options for anonymizing the data.","category":"Digital infrastructure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invest in digital infrastructure, promote digital literacy and education, and provide incentives for technology adoption.","category":"Digital infrastructure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inclusion of flowers","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implementing effective disease control measures, awareness programs, and infrastructure improvements","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop comprehensive measures to capture variance in gardening activities, including physical capacity and gardening intensity","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement nonpharmaceutical transmission control measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitor and manage gastrointestinal symptoms, enhance diagnostic capabilities","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating historical pandemic data into current pandemic management strategies","category":"Learning from pandemic","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provision of separate sanitation facilities, improvement of housing infrastructure","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Big data analysis","category":"Data analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote education and awareness about the importance of social distancing","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in digital infrastructure for remote learning, provide devices and internet access to students, support teachers and parents in adapting to remote education.","category":"Digital infrastructure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhance safety training, provide adequate personal protective equipment (PPE), and enforce strict health and safety protocols","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Messaging tools","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of dynamic strategies in facilities management","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improve indoor ventilation, reduce occupant density, and enforce mask-wearing.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement health and safety measures on construction sites, provide financial support to affected contractors, and adapt project timelines to account for delays.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular validation and calibration of wearable technology, in conjunction with traditional testing methods and clinical assessment.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Screening and testing of plasma donors, pathogen reduction technologies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement regular monitoring and calibration of chlorine dosage equipment","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular and thorough cleaning and disinfection of bathroom surfaces, improving ventilation in the bathroom to reduce aerosol concentration","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Home isolation and quarantine","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hot water availability","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of layouts, installation of barriers, and scheduling occupancy","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted public health interventions, increase access to healthcare services, and promote hygiene awareness","category":"Healthcare access","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust in official governmental media","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"PPE distribution","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of early alert systems","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification and regulation of non-transportation sources of air pollution, incentivizing cleaner heating technologies","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting thorough cultural and environmental impact assessments before implementing changes to urban green spaces","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modification of building envelopes to reduce mosquito accessibility","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"City planning for disease resilience and sustainability","category":"Space and occupancy management","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Promoting sustainable tourism practices, implementing environmental protection measures, and supporting local communities","category":"Green infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve building ventilation systems and air circulation, ensure proper maintenance of HVAC systems.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide clear explanations and evidence of 5G’s applications in pandemic control","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhanced data security measures and encryption","category":"Data security","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving ventilation systems, increasing fresh air intake, using air purifiers and filters","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing alternative virtual platforms for networking, providing online training and skill development opportunities, and addressing biases through targeted interventions","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
